front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Design of Cable Raceway Systems for Electric Generating Facilities

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: IEEE STD 422 provides guidance for the design and installation of cable raceway systems for all types of electric generating facilities except for nuclear power plants and nuclear facilities, and provides recommendations, methods and best engineering practices for the design of cable raceway systems including selection of equipment, materials and the configuration of raceway.
